general.name: Del Castillo Sergio
general.headline: Backend Developer
about: ðŸ‘‹ Hey there! I'm Sergio Del Castillo

As a Backend Developer with more than 8 years of dedicated professional experience, I've been at the forefront of designing and implementing scalable, multi-platform software solutions. My foundational knowledge from Communications and Electronic Engineering complements my practical skills, enabling me to build efficient backend systems and manage complex database architectures, particularly leveraging Node.js. I'm committed to delivering high-quality, performant, and secure applications.

Away from development, I unwind by indulging in my passion for pizza. I believe in continuous self-improvement, embracing new challenges, and collaborating effectively within dynamic teams to achieve shared goals

experiences.title: Backend Developer
experiences.description: I'm working on a project that uses Node.js, AWS, CI/CD, Next.js, and PostgreSQL. I'm also responsible for the backend development of the project.

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
experiences.description: I localized the website from Spain to Mexico, adapting the Spanish translation and implementing regional payment methods for the Latin American market.
